name: Abhishek Kaplesh
readme_content:
# 💫 Hey there! 👋 I'm Abhishek Kaplesh
I’m an Aspiring Full-Stack (MERN) Developer currently working as a React.js Developer. Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and user-friendly web applications, I thrive on crafting seamless digital experiences.

With expertise in React.js, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, I love developing end-to-end solutions that merge functionality with great design. I’m always eager to explore new technologies, optimize performance, and write clean, maintainable code.

🚀 What I Do:
✔️ Build dynamic & interactive frontends with React.js & Tailwind CSS
✔️ Develop robust backend solutions with Node.js & Express.js
✔️ Manage data efficiently using MongoDB & Redux
✔️ Follow best coding practices & version control with Git/GitHub

I’m on a mission to keep learning, keep building, and keep innovating. Let's connect and create something amazing!

📫 Email: abkaplesh02@gmail.com

Abkaplesh02/FakeShop-ReactJs.summary: Recent activities have focused on improving the user server API, adding functionality to the payment page, updating the redux page, resolving payment-related bugs, and making the wishlist and cart fully functional.

Abkaplesh02/NetFlix_gpt.summary: The project has seen recent updates targeting bugs related to the header and authentication components.

profile_summary: As an experienced React.js developer and aspiring full-stack developer with expertise in MERN technology stack, I leverage my skills in building scalable, efficient, and user-friendly web applications. My proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS enables me to craft seamless digital experiences. Currently working on refining my expertise in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, I'm always eager to explore new technologies and write clean, maintainable code.
